goal.ch:
這門課程的教學目標為：
1熟悉基礎商業溝通
掌握用英文進行自我介紹、介紹公司背景和產品的技巧
學習提供準確信息和清晰表達個人意見的方法
如何撰寫商務書信(例如電子郵件)

2培養基本求職技能
撰寫英文求職信和製作英文簡歷
模擬英文求職面試，提升面試應答技巧

3熟悉如用英文召開會議與商務情境邀約管理
學習會議管理技能，包括擔任會議主席、會議開場、進程與控制
掌握提出請求、詢問許可、發出邀請、安排及重新安排約會的表達方式

4習得英文簡報與報告技巧
學習英文簡報架構及技巧及描述圖表的能力
goal.en:
The learning objectives of this course are:

1.Familiarize with Basic Business Communication
Master the skills of introducing yourself, your company‘s background, and products in English
Learn how to provide accurate information and express personal opinions clearly
Learn how to write business correspondence (e.g., emails)
Develop Basic Job Application Skills

2. Write English cover letters and create English resumes
Simulate English job interviews to improve interview response skills
Become Proficient in Conducting Meetings and Managing Business Invitations in English

3. Learn meeting management skills, including chairing meetings, opening meetings, and controlling the meeting process
Master the expressions for making requests, asking for permission, extending invitations, scheduling, and rescheduling appointments

4. Acquire English Presentation and Reporting Skills
Learn the structure and techniques of English presentations and the ability to describe visual aids (e.g., charts and graphs)
